constant: integral a dx = ax + C, where a and C are both constants
exponential functions: integral ln(x) dx = x ln(x) -x + C
difference: integral (f - g) dx = integral f dx - integral g dx
multiplication by constant: integral cf(x) dx = c (integral f(x) dx), where c is a constant
parts: integral u v da = u(integral v da) - integral u`(integral v da) da; u isfunction of u(a); v is function of v(a); u` is derivative of function u(a)
